author: Michael C. Bender
title: Trump Says Strikes Aimed at Ending Syria’s Use of Chemical Weapons, Sending Message to Russia and Iran
text:
WASHINGTON—In a speech to the nation Friday night, President Donald Trump said the decision to launch strikes against Syria was aimed at the eliminating the nation’s ability to use chemical weapons, deterring the use and spread of such weapons and sending a message to two of Syria’s patrons, Russia and Iran.
“We are prepared to sustain this response until the Syrian regime stops its use of prohibited chemical agents,” Mr. Trump said at the White House on Friday.
... RELATED VIDEO Trump Announces U.S. Strike on Syria President Donald Trump said the recent suspected chemical attack in Syria was the crime of a “monster” and the strikes aim to deter the production and use of chemical weapons. Photo: AP To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
